nodes.text: Void striders were a species that lived on the planet Abafar. They were nimble creatures with long thin legs and necks who ran in herds across Abafar's deserts in search of water.

During the Clone Wars, Colonel Meebur Gascon and WAC-47, after separating from the other members of D-Squad, jumped onto these creatures and rode them to the town of Pons Ora, where the other members of D-Squad had already arrived.
